campus_life.summary: This document outlines various aspects of campus life, including student organizations, essential services like the hostel, library, and transportation, and recreational activities. It also highlights specific initiatives and events such as the National Cadet Corps (NCC), National Service Scheme (NSS), Unifest, Arts & Culture programs, the Smart India Hackathon 2022, and Toycathon.

grievance_redressal.summary: The provided text outlines various online portals and committees designed for grievance redressal and the prevention of discrimination and harassment. These include an online portal for students and employees to report grievances, a committee for the prevention of caste-based discrimination in the workplace, and a committee dedicated to preventing sexual harassment.

research.summary: This document outlines the research initiatives and achievements of the Galgotias Centre for Interdisciplinary Research. It highlights various aspects of research excellence and global engagement, including a Research & Development Cell, department-wise publication summaries, organized events at both international and national levels, sessions with Nobel laureates, DSIR-SIRO recognition, research group diversity, student projects, honorary professors, and a specific Centre of Excellence for Semiconductor Research.
